I deal with customers on my work, and it helps to 'read' them, i.e. learning in an instant if they are difficult or easy to deal with. It doesn't matter if they lie to me or not, but lying is something we all do
 I wonder how life would be if we couldn't lie. I suppose social interaction would be minimal and quite different from what it is.
 Other primates also lie, so it must have an evolutionary advantage.
 Jim Carrey, was funny in "Liar, Liar". Why is it that America's funniest men are all Canadians? 
 
 Why People Are Better At Lying Online Than Telling A Lie Face-to-face
 
 
 Lying? The Face Betrays Deceiver's True Emotions, But In Unexpected Ways

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Congenital Liars? Not me!
